tool_description: Analyzes and optimizes payment terms between company and vendors considering cash flow impact, early payment discounts, and industry standards.

annual_spend_estimate.description: Estimated annual spending with vendor in USD

error_messages: Invalid payment terms: Use standard payment terms format (net_30, net_60, net_90, 2_10_net_30).
Annual spend invalid: Must be a positive number representing estimated annual spend.
Vendor not found: Provided vendor_id does not exist in the system.
Analysis failed: Unable to complete payment terms analysis due to insufficient vendor data.
usage: Provide vendor_id, proposed_terms, and annual_spend_estimate. The tool analyzes the proposed terms and provides optimization recommendations.

cash_flow_impact.description: Estimated cash flow impact in USD

potential_savings.description: Potential annual savings from optimized terms

industry_benchmark.description: Industry standard payment terms for comparison
